subject: AI & Agents
title: What Is a Recommendation System?
description: A micro-lesson that makes What Is a Recommendation System? usable.

hook.text: Netflix knows what you want to watch before you do. How?

buildup.text: Recommendation systems predict which items a user will find relevant or interesting.

discovery.text: They analyze patterns in user behavior: clicks, purchases, ratings, and watch time.

twist.text: Recommendations drive 35% of Amazon's revenue and 80% of Netflix views.

climax.text: Any product with a catalog and users can benefit from recommendations.

punchline.text: Help users find what they didn't know they wanted.

quiz.question: What do recommendation systems predict?
options: Which items a user will find relevant
